headline: Did Charter’s Always‑On “Invincible WiFi” Launch Just Shift Charter Communications' (CHTR) Investment Narrative?
summary: Earlier in February 2026, Spectrum, part of Charter Communications, launched “Invincible WiFi,” the first WiFi 7 service with integrated battery backup and 5G cellular failover, offered to residential and business customers with tiered pricing and inclusion in select 2 Gig Internet plans. By pairing this always-on WiFi offering with a $1,000 first-year savings value pledge for new mobile and internet customers, Charter is sharpening its pitch around reliability and bundled value to attract...
